question: A large company in your area has decided to spend a certain amount of money, either to sponsor a local children's sports team for two years, or to pay for two open-air concerts.It has asked for feedback from the general public.Write a letter to the company. In your letter* Describe the benefits of sponsoring the sports team * Summarize the benefits of paying for the concerts* Say how you think the company should spend the money
text: I am writing this letter to explain in which ways you would obtain a positive feedback from the general public.

Firstly, sponoring a sport children’s team could increase the number of visitors, for example families and friends, and also the development level of the team. We could display the advertisement campaign during challenging the competition.

Secondly, we have another alternative option which is paying for the concert. This choice could be a great advantage, because a lot of people could be beneficited from it. In other words, we could hire a local musician band in support of the community and society. Moreover, we could offer some kind of gratuitous item in order to promote our company at the same time.
Both of them put forward valid points, however, I believe that a sponsoring a local children’s sport team could benefit our company in the long-run herewith the gratitude from the society.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
